sources.name: userData
sources.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table') ~> userData

sources.name: orders
sources.script:
source(output(
		
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	limit: 100,
	batchSize: 50,
	format: 'table') ~> orders
